subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The 2015 renovation may be the final chance for Coach Tom Coughlin, who brought back Steve Spagnuolo, the architect of the team’s Super Bowl-winning defense in the 2007 season, to help.
snippet: The 2015 renovation may be the final chance for Coach Tom Coughlin, who brought back Steve Spagnuolo, the architect of the team’s Super Bowl-winning defense in the 2007 season, to help.
